heading.name: Diabetes with HbA1C in Range
heading.definition: % of patients with diabetes whose most recent glycemic control in the last 12 months was in the following ranges: HbA1C <= 7% 7% < HbA1C <= 8.5% HbA1C > 8.5%
heading.framework: Based on and adapted from AFHTO D2D 3.0 Indicators: Data Dictionary version 4 (Nov 2015)
heading.notes: Diabetes HbA1c in range query created for Ontario Medical Doctors

indicatorQuery.query:
SELECT
IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN fin.hba1c <= ${lowerLimit.a1c} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) , 0) AS "HbA1C <= 7%",
IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN fin.hba1c BETWEEN ${lowerLimit.a1c} AND ${upperLimit.a1c} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) , 0) AS "7% < HbA1C <= 8.5%",
IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN fin.hba1c > ${upperLimit.a1c} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) , 0) AS "HbA1C > 8.5%"
FROM ( SELECT d.demographic_no AS patient, A1C.dataField AS hba1c FROM demographic d INNER JOIN dxresearch dxr ON ( d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no)
-- HbA1C measurement LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.dataField, m.demographicNo FROM measurements m JOIN ( SELECT MAX(`name`) AS 'name' FROM measurementMap WHERE loinc_code LIKE ${loinc} GROUP BY `name` ) mm ON (mm.`name` = m.type) WHERE DATE(m.dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.date} AND m.demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY m.demographicNo HAVING COUNT(m.demographicNo) > -1 ) A1C ON (d.demographic_no = A1C.demographicNo)
WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${active} AND dxr.dxresearch_code IN ${dxCodes} AND dxr.`status` NOT LIKE "%D%" AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} ) fin;
